content: I'm planning a trip to the mountains next month and I'm trying to decide between two hiking boots, the Merrell Moab 2 Mid Waterproof and the Keen Targhee II Mid WP. Do you have any recommendations or comparisons between the two? By the way, I've been doing a lot of outdoor activities lately, like attending a music festival last month, and my trusty old Converse Chuck Taylor All Star sneakers, which I've had for years, were perfect for it.
